Text: I see that we have all forgotten something important with this great upload ... and I am guilty of it far to often ... Thank You Micron66.  Thank you very much!!

Sprocket3K,you are most welcome.Honestly speaking,these ebook torrents are a real pain,compared to uploading music,movies etc.

First,one has to search all over for the books,then sort out the rubbish versions from the readable/good quality versions,for this i have to skim through various versions of the same book ,this takes time,then i have to correct the author/title/series name as most people do not bother to name books in an organized fashion,all this takes time .

But i will continue to upload ebooks ,i love to read,hopefully other people do too.

oh..and lastly,don't forget to seed guys,the longer u seed ,more people will be able to download.

THANK YOU!  
I really do appreciate what you do here!
Simply AMAZING! Fantastic work sir

@ineffed & customice

thanks guys,good to know you are enjoying these books,some good stuff in this torrent,i'm looking forward to reading 'Drive' by James Sallis just to see how the movie compares to the original book.
Thanks so much!

Appreciate the upload and the effort involved.


Cheers
